product_name: Sony Action Cam Live View Remote
long_description: The wristwatch-style Sony Action Cam Live View Remote has its own LCD screen and a comfortable wrist strap, letting you control your Action Cam (sold separately) remotely and watch live-view footage. Live View is shockproof and waterproof down to 16 ft., perfect for any sport including surfing and snowboarding. Compatible with other Sony NFC/Wi-FI devices, including assorted NEX, Alpha and Music Cams. The Sony Action Cam Live View Remote offers approximately 240 minutes of continuous operating time with its long-lasting battery.
short_description: The wristwatch-style Sony Action Cam Live View Remote has its own LCD screen and a comfortable wrist strap, letting you control your Action Cam (sold separately) remotely and watch live-view footage.
